name: Space Ore
description: The Space Ecosystem is a project that hopes to create value for $SPO through various utilities. The plan is to develop games that will require $SPO to play. These games will provide semi-passive income and will burn $SPO. The first game called ‘Space Field’ is a miner and will pay you 3% daily. The one after that is called ‘Space Port’. We will continue to develop more games for the ecosystem that’ll appeal to both active and passive investors.
